Perfect Anatomy.prompt: perfect human anatomy, correct structure, (natural joint positions:1.2), realistic muscle attachment points, medically accurate body structure

Natural Anatomy.prompt: realistic human anatomy, natural body variation, subtle asymmetry, slight posture imperfections, organic muscle distribution, realistic proportions

Symmetrical Face.prompt: highly symmetrical facial features, perfectly aligned pupils, balanced facial proportions, realistic cranial structure

Natural Face.prompt: natural facial asymmetry, slight eyebrow variation, subtle eye alignment differences, organic facial proportions

Detailed Extremities.prompt: highly detailed hands and feet, individual fingers and toes, (5 fingers:1.2), (5 toes:1.2), realistic nails and cuticles

Stable Pose.prompt: stable and natural posture, realistic weight distribution, grounded stance, center of gravity alignment

Geometric Precision.prompt: straight lines, perfect geometric architecture, stable structures, rectilinear alignment, vanishing point accuracy

Clean Lines.prompt: crisp and clean outlines, well-defined borders, zero color bleeding, sharp separation of elements

Consistent Textures.prompt: uniform material textures, realistic surface consistency, (physically based rendering:1.1), high-detail skin pores

Organic Skin Texture.prompt: organic skin texture, uneven pigmentation, subtle surface variation, natural oil distribution, realistic skin micro-detail

Fixed Grounding.prompt: subject standing on solid ground, realistic shadows under feet, contact shadows, floor contact
